adHeader: Rear view back up camera for VW Tiguan Passat Jetta /Sportwagen
adDetails: Genuine Volkswagen rear view camera kit for: 2009 2010 2011 2012 2013 Tiguan 2011 2012 2013 Jetta / Sportwagen 2011 2012 2013 Passat 2011+ Touareg. ((Navigation RNS310 or RNS315 or RNS510 is required)) Camera kit only: $190, or $330 (Tiguan $340) with installation. Cash price. Professional installation done at your location. It takes about 4 hours. This is a factory equipment. If you're unfamiliar with this, you can please take a look at this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NE-INI0NhNw Phone: (4O8) Nine82-734Eight keywords: golf gti 2.0T back up vag-com vagcom TDI auto automatic manual 5 speed carpet monster mat vag com hex+can hex can micro can
